help.en:
Available commands:
/start <author> - Start a new session
/process - Extract poem title and text from uploaded images
/edittitle <title> - Change poem title
/editpoem <text> - Change poem text
/editauthor <author> - Change poem author
/upload - Upload the poem information to the website
/getinfo - Show information of the processed poem
/deleteall - Delete all poems uploaded by the user
/deleteauthor <author> - Delete all poems by a specific author uploaded by the user
/deletepoem <title> & <author> - Delete a specific poem uploaded by the user
/reset - Reset current session
/help - Show this help message
help.es:
Comandos disponibles:
/start <autor> - Inicia sesiÃ³n
/process - Extrae el poema y el tÃ­tulo de las imÃ¡genes enviadas
/edittitle <tÃ­tulo> - Cambia el tÃ­tulo del poema
/editpoem <texto> - Cambia el texto del poema
/editauthor <autor> - Cambia el autor del poema
/upload - Sube el poema a la web
/getinfo - Muestra informaciÃ³n del poema procesado
/deleteall - Borra todos los poemas subidos por un usuario
/deleteauthor <autor> - Borra todos los poemas de un autor subidos por un usuario
/deletepoem <tÃ­tulo> & <autor> - Borra un poema especÃ­fico de un usuario
/reset - Reinicia la sesiÃ³n actual
/help - Muestra este panel de informaciÃ³n
